ygData.subject: Re: Cognoggin
ygData.msgSnippet: Gearheart is the one you must destroy, he is gnome shaped and located in the fairy village. he used to spawn in Cognoggin s spot but that was fixed about a
ygData.messageBody:
Gearheart is the one you must destroy, he is gnome shaped and located in the
fairy village. he used to spawn in Cognoggin's spot but that was fixed about
a month or two ago

Fixer, gnome enchanter, Cazic Thule


> From: trond ivar hansen <zafigomchic@...>
>
> > Has anyone ever heard of a gnome clockwork NPC
> called Cognoggin?
>
> It is not the one involved with the quest, as already
> posted. (The quest one is a spider clockwork, not a
> gnome shaped one). Cognoggin usually stands by the
> obeservatory in LF, peeking into the telescope.
>
> Piip Ignatz, rogue
> Pirates of Dark Tide
> Innoruuk
>
